content.raw:
I think this line doesn't fully capture the code suggested in issue #92, which said:
~~~
Int = Output - effort - kp*err - kd*(err - old_err)/dt - kp_vel*(velocity - measured_velocity)
Int = clamp(Int, min_effort, max_effort);
~~~
Perhaps it should be:
~~~
this->errorTerms[i].k_i_q_i = math::clamp(this->errorTerms[i].k_i_q_i + intTieBack,
  static_cast<double>(-this->effortLimit[i]),
  static_cast<double>(this->effortLimit[i]));
~~~
content.html:
I think this line doesn't fully capture the code suggested in issue #92, which said:

Int = Output - effort - kp*err - kd*(err - old_err)/dt - kp_vel*(velocity - measured_velocity)
Int = clamp(Int, min_effort, max_effort);

Perhaps it should be:

this->errorTerms[i].k_i_q_i = math::clamp(this->errorTerms[i].k_i_q_i + intTieBack,
  static_cast<double>(-this->effortLimit[i]),
  static_cast<double>(this->effortLimit[i]));
